author: Sam
content: So Charlie Kirk was killed on 9/10 such that 9/11 was barely mentioned, now that we know from general Wesley Clark that Netanyahu planned war on “seven countries in five years” which became the “War on Terror” and the “dancing Israelis” spotted by a N.Jersey housewife admitted they were there to “document the event” of 9/11, which someone who knew about it beforehand shorted shares in airlines and insurance companies.
